comment: Электромонахи кланяются и приветствуют игрока на выходе из подвала, после победы над Зарей

languages.text: "Да не оскудеет заряд благости Омниссии в батареях преданных!"
"May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"
languages.original_text: "Да не оскудеет заряд благости Омниссии в батареях преданных!"

traits.locale_text: "May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"
"May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"
"May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"
"May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"
"May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"
"May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"

languages.text: "Möge die Ladung der Gnade des Omnissiah in den Batterien der Gläubigen Bestand haben!"
languages.original_text: "May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"

traits.locale_text: "Möge die Ladung der Gnade des Omnissiah in den Batterien der Gläubigen Bestand haben!"

languages.text: « Que le courant de la grâce de l'Omnimessie circule à jamais dans les batteries des fidèles. »
languages.original_text: "May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"

traits.locale_text: « Que le courant de la grâce de l'Omnimessie circule à jamais dans les batteries des fidèles. »

languages.text: “愿欧姆尼塞亚的恩典在虔诚之人的蓄电池中永存不灭。”
languages.original_text: "May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"

traits.locale_text: “愿欧姆尼塞亚的恩典在虔诚之人的蓄电池中永存不灭。”

languages.text: 「万機神の恩寵のチャージが、忠実なる者のバッテリーに長く残りますように！」
languages.original_text: "May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の恩寵のチャージが、忠実なる者のバッテリーに長く残りますように！」

languages.text: «¡Que la carga de la gracia del Omnissiah persista en las baterías de los fieles!».
languages.original_text: "May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que la carga de la gracia del Omnissiah persista en las baterías de los fieles!».

languages.text: "Hermesih'in lütfuyla bezeli o mukaddes yük, inançlıların bataryalarında ebediyen hüküm sürsün."
languages.original_text: "May the charge of the Omnissiah's grace persist in the batteries of the faithful!"

traits.locale_text: "Hermesih'in lütfuyla bezenmiş o mukaddes yük, inançlıların bataryalarında ebediyen varlığını sürdürsün!"
